name: Aslan
about_text: Hi! I'm Aslanbek, a Frontend Developer focused on creating user-friendly and interactive websites. I specialize in
about_text1: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next Js, Tailwind CSS
about_text2: and responsive design. I enjoy building visually appealing and performant websites, collaborating in agile environments, and continuously improving my coding skills. Beyond development,
about_text4: trends, experimenting with design, and learning new web technologies. Let's connect and build amazing digital experiences together!
